bibl.title: Ptolemaic circular letter from Deir el-Banat
bibl.seg: Elena Chepel, Ptolemaic Circular Letter from Deir el-Banat.
bibl.note: Cartonnage discovered in November 2017 during excavations by the Centre for Egyptological Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences. Fragment of official correspondence that cites the entole of Artemon, who is known to be a high official at the Ptolemaic court. Deir el-Banat (Arsinoite), 226 BC.
bibl.seg: Cartonnage discovered in November 2017 during excavations by the Centre for Egyptological Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences.
